feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.63
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for types for qb imports
  • Improvements for handling invoice reversals
  • Fixes for silent / session variables
  • Ensure Forte credentials are correctly padded
  • Project reports
  • Improve locations api documentation
  • Adjustments for match transaction query
  • Upcoming / Past Due Dashboard query updates
  • v5.11.63 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10858

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.62...v5.11.63

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.64
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • v5.11.64 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10870
  • Fixes for playful design not breaking correctly
  • Catch on checkout.com credit card authorization failure
  • Fixes for duplicate rotessa gateway being displayed
  • Ensure payment set for statements only contain the required payments

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.63...v5.11.64

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.65
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for chunked uploads in react application.
  • v5.11.65 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10872

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.64...v5.11.65

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.66
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for docker logos in group/client scenarios
  • Fixes for last year query
  • v5.11.66 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10877

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.65...v5.11.66

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.67
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Force locale for import hints
  • Additional middleware to check json quality
  • Additional translations
  • Prevent duplicate requisitions
  • Reduce number of queries to GoCardless/Nordigen to help prevent 429's
  • Fixes for EPC
  • Change order of indexes
  • Performance tracing with sentry
  • Updates for tax summary reports
  • Health route

  • Additional status values when processing csv imports

  • v5.11.67 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10890

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.66...v5.11.67
